title: 2013 Dodge Ram 1500 4.7L  with Gibson Split Rear Exhaust
description:
Part # 6565 Aluminized (Also available in Stainless # 66565)
09-15 Dodge Ram 1500 Crew Cab, Quad Cab, Standard Bed, Short Bed 4.7L  2wd

www.GibsonPerformance.com

For the enthusiast who wants an awesome look and aggressive throaty sound this Dual Split Cat back exhaust is for you. Gibson Exhaust Systems decrease backpressure and produce more torque and increased horsepower. Typical gains average of 15-20 horsepower. Stainless dual Tip exit straight out the back. Works with most bumpers, roll pans and trailer hitches. Exhaust sound is louder under towing conditions. Hassle Free bolt- on installation. No welding required. Backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty.

– 2.25-in. aluminized mandrel bent tubing.
– Gibson Muffler features a baffled & chambered design, no internal packing, powerful deep tone.
– 4in. Polished T304 Stainless Rolled Slash- Cut Tip.
– Exit Is Straight Out The Back.
– Includes all hardware and factory style hangers for easy bolt on installation.
– Lifetime Limited Warranty
